data.text:
@neilbosworth @gillianoberholzer

Agreed... BUT.... there is always a "BUT" :smile: 

We have 8 million ID's and they dont.

1. Cant Inoxico provide us with their ID's so that we can give them a linked CaseInformationID. Should be way less than 8 million records they will provide.

2. We create a method for them that works on the OLD ID and we dont bill them for the calls.


PS:- Addworks did call earlier.

@gillianoberholzer @cobuspienaar @stefanbar @jakovanrensburg @willemhuman

card.name: CW - CCW363 - Inoxico Incorrect images via API
